entries.journal_entry_description: Looks like some Black Sun have rewired the droids as a diversion. They are using this diversion to slice into the main databanks of the station. Loche needs you to find them, and stop them.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Use the elevator to head down to the lower level.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to go to the Lower Level
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Go to the basement and take out some of the Black Sun that are slicing into the main security system.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Kill the Black Sun Slicers in the Data Storage Room
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Find and take out at least one Master level slicer. They should be near the other slicers
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Kill a Master Slicer in the Data Storage Room
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Now that you have completed the tasks that Loche set for you, use the elevator to return to the main level.
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to return to the Main Level
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Return to Loche now that you have eliminated most of the slicers
entries.task04_journal_entry_title: Return to Loche in the Ranged Combat Training Room
